mapper.select: select e.emp_no, e.name, e.email, e.join_date, d.dept_name, j.job_title, e.intl_no from tb_employee e join tb_department d using(dept_no) join tb_company c using(cp_no) join tb_job_title j using(job_title_no) where j.cp_no = #{cp_no} order by e.join_date desc

select e.emp_no, e.name, e.email, e.join_date, d.dept_name, j.job_title, e.intl_no from tb_employee e join tb_department d using(dept_no) join tb_company c using(cp_no) join tb_job_title j using(job_title_no) where j.cp_no = #{cp_no}
order by e.emp_no
order by e.join_date desc
order by e.name desc

select e.name, d.dept_name, e.email, e.phone, j.job_title, e.intl_no, e.resign_yn from tb_employee e join tb_department d using(dept_no) join tb_company c using(cp_no) join tb_job_title j using(job_title_no) where j.cp_no = #{cp_no} and e.emp_no = #{emp_no}
select d.dept_name from tb_department d join tb_company c using(cp_no) where cp_no = #{cp_no} order by d.dept_name
select j.job_title from tb_job_title j join tb_company c using(cp_no) where cp_no = #{cp_no} order by job_level desc
